content.text: !!HOSTNAME!! can be downloaded from a deb repo or from git.
If you have Debian GNU/Linux Wheezy you can add the following into a new apt source file, e.g. /etc/apt/source.list.d/buetoworg.list:
content.code: deb http://deb.buetow.org/apt wheezy main deb-src http://deb.buetow.org/apt wheezy main
content.text: (Please replace wheezy with jessie if you are using Debian GNU/Linux Jessie) and run afterwards:
content.code: curl http://deb.buetow.org/apt/pubkey.gpg | sudo apt-key add - apt-get update apt-get install !!HOSTNAME!!
